product_name: Sawyer Blist-O-Ban Adhesive Bandages - Package of 4
long_description: Love your new hiking boots but hate breaking them in? Prevent blisters and hotspots before they form thanks to the innovative, flexible dome design of the Sawyer Blist-O-Ban Adhesive Bandages.
short_description: Love your new hiking boots but hate breaking them in? Prevent blisters and hotspots before they form thanks to the innovative, flexible dome design of the Sawyer Blist-O-Ban Adhesive Bandages.
